title: Disciple
description: Aubrey Dalton’s life as a single mother is anything but easy, the last thing she needs to complicate it is getting mixed up with the local biker gang. That is exactly what happens though when she and her children are attacked by a rival club looking to settle a score with the Northridge Disciples MC. Now Bree has to struggle with not only facing new advisories but also her attraction the Disciple’s president, Will Ryder.Ryder had a dysfunctional childhood at best which is why he’s never chosen to settle down. That and the fact that life in as the president of a MC consumes every minute of his day. But when he meets Aubrey, the single mom who happens to look like a Playboy centerfold, he rethinks his priorities. The only problem is that he needs to keep Bree alive long enough to get to know her and her endearing kids because she’s been targeted by his old enemies and they don’t seem to care if they take innocent lives in order to get to him.***This book may not be suitable for readers under the age of 18 due to offensive language and sexual content.
author: Cherie Hewitt
